data.title: Entity Data
data.description: SNBT-formatted string (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/NBT_format#SNBT_format) containing entity data (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Entity_format#Entity_Format) information

anyOf.description: Any negative or positive number to represent absolute world coordinates

Any negative or positive number to represent absolute world coordinates, a relative coordinate (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Coordinates#Relative_world_coordinates) or a local coordinate (https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Coordinates#Local_coordinates)

PosAxis.title: Position Axis
PosAxis.description: Describe x/y/z placement position for entity. If omitted, axis value defaults to the corresponding axis in the request URL.
